Name: Barnamint
Ingredients: 45 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille cr√®me de menthe
Instructions: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.
Review: If you're after a drinkable dessert, then this TGI classic may be the cocktail for you.
History: This original TGI Friday's cocktail is named after the Barnum & Bailey Circus, which also inspired the red and white awnings outside Friday's restaurants.
